app_descript:
App Name: JioTV

Package Name: com.jio.jioplay.tv

Brief:

JioTV is an all-in-one streaming platform providing a vast selection of television content across multiple genres. With access to the most popular channels in entertainment, sports, news, and more, JioTV caters to a wide audience, ensuring viewers can enjoy their favorite programs live or catch up on missed shows at their convenience.
